> <OLD>
>
> Tucson hears the voice and immediately stops moving.  It made sense,
> sometimes it was far better not to move then to run.  He was also losing
> energy rather quickly and felt the need to conserve it.
>
> He lies down on his belly, with his neck down on the ground and tail coiled
> tightly around his feet.  Wings are tucked tightly against his body to
> conceal himself in the vegetation.

<NEW>

There was a moment of near silence as GRIMLOCK shifted into beast mode
and sniffed the air, his head turning one way and then the other, his
keen senses looking for the slightest scent of something. Nothing
moved but the breezes, even the sounds of the animals had stopped.

He tilted his head finally as if finally caught the scent, and with
one of his dimuniative arms he pointed, "There!" he said with an eager
finality. "Get him!"

All four of the transmetal dinosaurs run at the scent GRIMLOCK picked
up, running away from TUSCON and down the path he had come!

"There." the voice said by TUSCON's ear, this time the voice sounded
tired and worn. "I hope your friends do not posses the hubris that you
do." There is another feeling of strange breezes and energy and then
the world seemed to shift back into focus.

GRIMLOCK and his team were gone, the sound of them moving through the
foliage could be heard moving away.

(TAG)

Preston
